channel.title: Dementhium 639 Respawn where you die
channel.description: I made it so that you don't loose items on death and now players respawn where they die instead of going to home. I have tried to find a solution to the problem but I just can't find one. Somebody please help, this is vital for a good eco server.

item.title: Dementhium 639 Respawn where you die
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

can you post death methods? i am not really familiar with 639 dementhium so you will have to find the methods your self

Read full topic
